context.name: Hawke Airmax 30 SF 8-32x50 AMX IR Rifle Scope
context.excerpt: The Hawke Airmax 30 SF 8-32×50 AMX IR Rifle Scope has been specially designed for air rifle use, with a rugged and durable build quality to withstand double recoil.
context.content:
The Hawke Airmax 30 SF 8-32x50 AMX IR Rifle Scope has been specially designed for air rifle use, with a rugged and durable build quality to withstand double recoil. Providing exceptionally clear images with side focus control for accurate focus.

Hawke Airmax 30 SF 8-32x50 AMX IR Rifle Scope Features

16 layer fully multi-coated optics for exceptional clarity
Side focus control for parallax adjustment to infinity
30mm mono-tube chassis for superior strength
Glass etched reticle with red illumination
Stepless rheostat offers total brightness control
Â¼ MOA exposed, locking and resettable turrets
Fast focus eyebell and high torque zoom ring
